name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Should I See It? - Netflix Ratings & Reviews

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best way to discover the best movies and shows to watch on Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a way to discover the best movies and tv shows to watch on Netflix? Look no further than the 'Should I See It?' extension. It is designed to make it easier than ever to find the perfect movie for your next streaming session.

Features:

âœ… See IMDb movie ratings for all Netflix movies and shows at a glance
âœ… Read IMDb user reviews for movies and shows on Netflix
âœ… Filter out Netflix movies and shows with rating score below your desired value
âœ… Share your favorite Netflix movies on Twitter with just a single click

Note: The extension shows a rounded up value of the original IMDB movie rating to help you sieve through the noise

Don't waste any more time scrolling through endless lists of movies and shows on Netflix. Install the 'Should I See It?' extension today and start discovering the best movies and shows on Netflix in no time! ðŸš€
